TopicTitle: Doced ships explode violently upon file open

Articles.Content:
I have a couple ships docked via KAS telscopic pole.  They were working fine last night but when I load up the save game today, the ship exploads violently within a few seconds of loading.   I notice file not found and null object ref. errors in the console.  I've attached the console output as it blew up to see if any devs know what this is about.  PS, I'm a c# developer and would love to know what this is 

 https://www.dropbox.com/s/584pc0uz97as8wo/myshipblowingup.png?dl=0

 

Edited May 13, 2019 by dangros
forgot KAS detail
